long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use ClassSpaces on any device, including iPads!
 
Easily manage all your classes and learning materials for a more conducive learning environment, and with ZERO help from IT!
 
Popular Features:
– Focus Mode enables you to push and lock content onto students’ devices
– Temporarily restrict access to specific resources that are irrelevant to the lesson
– Choose from any opened tabs within the same browser to share directly with your students
– Revisit lesson materials with a resource repository that can be accessed at any time
– Get a preview of students’ active screen with the ability to close tabs remotely
– Timeline view gives you insights into what students are doing during lessons
– Integrated chat allows students and teachers to stay connected during lessons
– Drive deeper engagement with screen-sharing functionality that facilitates meaningful collaboration
 
Unlock new possibilities of blended learning with ClassSpaces!
Learn all about our features at www.ClassSpaces.org.
